I use Aunt Lydias crochet thread size 10 color Soft Mauve and crochet hook 175 mm. WRITTEN PATTERN OF VALENTINE DOILY. Pin On Crafts From pinterest.com This is a quick and easy to make crochet scrubby pattern that is great to make when you need a Valentines day gift fast.
